name: SEER Primary Tumor
title: SEER Primary Tumor
notes: **Note:**  Involvement of para-testicular (hilar/mediastinal) soft tissues does not alter the extension code. Code extent of the primary tumor based on other criteria documented in the patient record.
rows:
Localized only

Invasive tumor with/without vascular invasion limited to:
     Body of testis
     Rete testis
     Tunica albuginea
Surface implants
Tunica, NOS
Tunica vaginalis involved

Localized, NOS

Surface implants (surface of tunica vaginalis)
Tunica, NOS

Stated as T1 or T2

Regional by direct extension only

Extension to:
     Dartos muscle, ipsilateral
     Epididymis with/without vascular/lymphatic invasion
     Scrotum, ipsilateral
     Spermatic cord, ipsilateral
     Vas deferens###

Unknown extension
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
